text: Well, well, well, if it isn't Maria! How are things?

Hello, I'm Maria. And you are Alex, right? *smiling* It's nice to finally meet you in person. I hope you're doing well. *looking around the cafe* This is a lovely spot, by the way. My friend, Rachel, recommended it to me. *taking a seat* So, shall we get started?
Yes, thank you! So, Maria, have you thought about securing your future with our "sef-for-life" life insurance?
